verses.name: Matthew 27:13
verses.text: Then said Pilate unto him, Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee?

verses.name: Matthew 27:14
verses.text: And he answered him to never a word; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly.

verses.name: Matthew 27:15
verses.text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner, whom they would.

verses.name: Matthew 27:16
verses.text: And they had then a notable prisoner, called Barabbas.

verses.name: Matthew 27:17
verses.text: Therefore when they were gathered together, Pilate said unto them, Whom will ye that I release unto you? Barabbas, or Jesus which is called Christ?

verses.name: Matthew 27:18
verses.text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him.
